|chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = MHF4 |antenna = |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |acqam = |802.11ac = 867 |nqam = 400 |802.11n = 300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = Yes |addchip = 5GHz Front-End Module;Skyworks;SKY85734-11;5734, 2949;2; |flags = Wave2, MU-MIMO, high-gain, flip-up antenna |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 03/20/2020 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "2052500694" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. {{See also|TP-LINK Archer T series|TP-LINK}} *[https://github.com/MeissnerEffect/rtl8822bu/commit/5630b13e1076aeec410ad184f97f4cdf8bf8ddb8 ''Added support for TP-Link Archer T4U V3''] - [https://github.com/MeissnerEffect/rtl8822bu rtl8822bu] driver ([https://linuxwiki.de/LinuxWireless#Tp-Link_AC1300_Archer_T4U_V3 rtl8812bu]) ==See also== :;[[TP-LINK Archer T series]] â€¢ [[TP-LINK]] *[[TP-LINK Archer T4U]] v1 - AC1200 Wireless Dual Band USB 3.0 Adapter *[[TP-LINK Archer T4U v2]] - AC1300 Wireless Dual Band USB 3.0 Adapter *[[TP-LINK Archer T4U v3]] - AC1300 High Gain Wireless MU-[[MIMO]] USB Adapter :FCC ID: TE7T4UV3 (02/08/2018) *[[TP-LINK Archer T4U v3.2]] (v3.20) - AC1300 High Gain Wireless [[MU-MIMO]] USB Adapter :FCC ID: TE7T4UV32 (03/20/2020) *[[TP-LINK Archer T4U+]] (Plus v1) - AC1300 High Gain Wireless MU-MIMO USB Adapter :FCC ID: TE7T4UPLUS (09/27/2020) *[[TP-LINK Archer T3U+]] (Plus v1) - [[Realtek]] RTL8822BU [2357:0138] *[[TP-LINK Archer T3U]] (v1) - [[Realtek]] RTL8812BU [2357:012d] [[Category:English Documentation]]
